Package polyglot.ast

Interface VarDecl

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Copy<Node>, Node, NodeOps, java.io.Serializable, Term
All Known Subinterfaces:
Formal, LocalDecl
All Known Implementing Classes:
Formal_c, LocalDecl_c
public interface VarDecl
extends Term
A VarDecl represents a local variable declaration, of either a formal or a local variable.
